app_detail:
Gfycat makes it easy to create, find, and share high-quality GIFs and memes. Create moving selfies, make GIFs on the go, record gameplay on your phone, share funny memes, and more with Gfycat. Gfycat makes it easy to make GIFs and share them with your friends.

Create:
- Make GIFs and memes from your camera or gallery footage
- Upload GIFs from video links from any video site
- Record your screen to share game or app highlights
- Add stickers to your creations

Search:
- Search GIFs and memes from our library of millions
- Share the perfect reaction GIF using our reaction categories

Share:
- Send GIFs and memes on messaging platforms including Facebook Messenger, WhatsApp, SMS, Hangouts, or email
- Share GIFs and memes on social media platforms including Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Tumblr, or Pinterest
- Share the GIF link anywhere, including Reddit

Gfycat lets you make a GIF from your camera roll, a video link, a screen recording, or your camera. Add stickers to make your GIF pop!

Find GIFs for all your needs, from LOL to Bye, in our 200+ categories of carefully selected reactions and memes. We update our app regularly with seasonal content, so Gfycat is the perfect place to find winter GIFs, Valentine's Day GIFs, and more. What better way to say "I love you" than with a GIF? ğŸ˜˜
